format: YAML/Makefile-like pseudo-code with embedded Python functions
description: This file contains overridden snippets and functions for customizing build steps in a Yocto Project environment, specifically for modifying configuration files and handling specific machine overrides during SDK build processes.

methods.name: do_populate_sdk_ext_prepend
methods.description: Modifies build configuration based on presence of a template configuration file.

methods.name: do_populate_sdk_ext_append
methods.description: Removes a template configuration file if specific machine overrides are present to avoid build issues.

methods.name: copy_buildsystem_prepend
methods.description: Appends a specific layer path to the build layer list if certain machine overrides are detected.

methods.name: copy_buildsystem_append
methods.description: Modifies the bblayers configuration file and handles copying kernel files for specific machines as part of SDK customization.
